Statement.Sql: INSERT INTO FIELD (mUpdated,mName,mType,mProperties) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mProperties=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select * from FIELD where mName=? and mType=?
INSERT INTO FIELDS (mUpdated,mGroup,mFieldId,mDisplay,mSort) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,?,?,?,?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mDisplay=?,mSort=?,mUpdated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
select f.*,s.mDisplay,s.mSort from FIELD f, FIELDS s where f.mId=s.mFieldId and s.mGroup=?
